seoTitle: New & Used Forklifts, Scissor Lifts & Material Handling Equipment | Lift Pros
seoDescription: Buy or lease new and used forklifts, scissor lifts, narrow aisle, and cold storage equipment. Authorized TAILIFT dealer in Fowler, CA serving the Central Valley.
heroDescription: Forklifts, scissor lifts, narrow aisle, and cold storage equipment. Buy or lease with competitive financing. We service everything we sell.

equipCards.title: Forklifts
equipCards.description: Propane and electric sit-down riders, stand-up counterbalance, and 3-wheel models. New TAILIFT units and quality used equipment.

equipCards.title: Narrow Aisle Equipment
equipCards.description: Reach trucks, order pickers, turret trucks, and VNA systems for maximizing warehouse storage density.

equipCards.title: Cold Storage Equipment
equipCards.description: Freezer-rated forklifts and material handling equipment designed for sub-zero warehouse and distribution environments.

equipCards.title: Scissor Lifts
equipCards.description: Electric and rough terrain scissor lifts for warehouse, construction, and maintenance applications.

equipCards.title: Pallet Jacks & Stackers
equipCards.description: Electric pallet jacks, walkie stackers, and rider pallet trucks for dock and floor operations.

equipCards.title: Tow Tractors & Specialty
equipCards.description: Tow tractors, burden carriers, personnel carriers, and specialty material handling solutions.

bannerText: New equipment backed by factory warranty and local service support.
inventorySubtitle: Contact us for our current list of available new and used equipment. Inventory changes frequently — call for the latest availability.
inventoryPlaceholder: We're building out our online inventory. In the meantime, give us a call or send a message and we'll get you a list of what's available.

whyBuyCards.title: We Service What We Sell
whyBuyCards.description: Every unit we sell is backed by our service team. Local repair, maintenance, and parts support from day one.

whyBuyCards.title: Inspected & Certified Used
whyBuyCards.description: Every used unit goes through our inspection process. We stand behind the equipment we sell.

whyBuyCards.title: Lease & Financing Options
whyBuyCards.description: Flexible lease programs and financing to fit your budget. Short-term rentals available for seasonal needs.

whyBuyCards.title: Free Junk Lift Haul Away
whyBuyCards.description: Replacing old equipment? We'll haul away your dead lifts at no cost anywhere in the Central Valley or greater California.

ctaText: Tell us what you need — make, model, capacity, application — and we'll find it. New or used.
